column5: I stayed there a couple of years ago and one of the guests at the resort next door would take a hobi cat out fishing directly in front of NH Krystal.....caught a giant snapper, and while pulling it in a shark bit it in half.   Quite the pics afterwards :-)
This sucks!!!! I was expecting scantily clad cuban girls.
Looking for a great report
Well, tap, tap, tap......  Good to have you back Fidel.  looking forward to the report.  Joey
pics of said scenery?  otherwise, i don't believe you!
Do you mean the nice sand and the palm trees and the beautiful blue water?
While we are waiting, anyone going March Break? I'll be on the neighbouring island Cayo Guillermo. Thinking of spending some cake and doing a day of serious fishin'. Pm me if your interested.
I have a buddy going there the last week of Feb. I'll let ya know how he makes out. Have you ever been before? Any tips to offer?  Sinker
Is this report gonna happen soon? I have to go fishing next week!!

I see Slackdrifter has been taking slacking lessons from the Snag type slackard!!!  Don't make me have to come up there and put a boot in your butt boy!!!   ... you have until 8pm EST to have that report on my desk son!

And it shall be done!  I just have alot on my plate.  Plus I'm just having a heck of a time resizing the photos.  This 250kb size restriction is pretty brutal, when you've got files that generaly hover around 3000kb!!  I'm using a batch image resizer right now and it's just too freakin slow.  If there's a site where I can upload my pictures and specify the size I want at the same time, I wanna know!  Either way, I'll wrap it up tonight.  Sorry for the delay!  HD

Hey dude,  I use a mac and re-size my photos in "i-photo" but they also automatically resize when i upload them to Photobucket.  It  takes 5 minutes to set up an account and makes your life much easier.  You can just select a whole folder of pictures, hit upload and walk away until it's done.  Cheers, UF
Like UF said.... Photobucket the way to go.... very easy.  Just make sure you set the resize option before you start uploading.  LM
Thanks UF.  I was told to try this website...  I'll tinker with it tonight!!  What about uploading videos?!  I've got some great stuff to share, but I'd to try something other than youtube...
Merci Grand!!
Sure lots of tips. It's a different type of fishing. First thing you gotta do is figure out what sort of fish you want to catch. Cuda being the easiest target.

Hey gang!  Just got back from Cayo Coco early this morning..  Weather was absolutely horrendous, but did manage to sneak out and caught all kinds of kewl little toothy critters..  Here's a wee sampler..      I missed ya'll soo much..  bon soir,  HD
Your such a tease man!!!!!  Get a full report going!!!!!!   Sinker
going to Cuba on sunday!!!  I've got my fishing rod packed too!!!
Lucky sod, and just in time for the warm weather here as well LOL! Where'd you stay? Jo and I stayed at the Melia Cayo Coco and loved it.
Welcome back Highdrifter Real serious toothy critter but please.... need some more porn to go with that teaser LOL  Jacques
Tinkle tinkle...  It's coming budday!!

They allowed you back into the country??   I remember diving for tiger lobster there.  Mmmmmmmmmmm   Welcome back!   P.s. I have to be around the Quay tomorrow. Possibly death star and cop shop, etc. Call me in the morning if you're able.
Hey HighDrifter is that a wahoo?
Nice.  Stayed at the NH Krystal Laguna.  This is what I woke up too every morning..      Gnight Mike
It's a wee cuda, or Becuna en espanol.
hd good luck there myself! awesome place , good fishing. You get any snapper? any big cudas? the bigest I caught was about 15 pounds

NADA Brah..  Only snot rockets.  The seas were too high and the fronts pretty much shut everything down for most of the week.  I lurked the lagoon mostly, but man!!  What a shweet little tidle pond..  Stay tuned.
Duude stop in at my office!  Lakeshore and Parklawn...  I'll give ya a ding in the morning.
Ya didn't see Old Moe? SAW HER 3 TIMES DURING MY TRIP.. OVER 5 FEET LONG!
WHAAAaaahh??!  She musta hid under the seafood restaurant..  I heard the chefs feed some bigguns there every night with scraps.  Oh boy I'm gonna be tossing and turning tonight!
Welcome back Bubba!!!  You can PM me the "Snapper" pics!
exactly where I saw her!
Gracias Dawg...  Shoulda went single!!  My neck's sore from all the beach scenery..  I'll save my best material for the real deal.
You got that report done yet?
Sorry brah, this must be like whatching one of those extended trailers.  I'm on it!!
C'mon c'mon!  On with the report, captain!
Lets see the report. My better half and I are contemplating goin to that same resort later this year. What did you take for lures and gear? Lookin for a heads up.
Lets see the beach report  oh ya some fish would be nice too
word!
On the Lucky Craft Pointer as well.  Nice!
